segments.text: Oh no, look at that sink; water's just gushing out uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's completely oblivious, drying her plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the puddle already; she could slip any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids over there, the boy's on that shaky stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so high to grab from the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just waiting with her hand out, not helping steady him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to end in tears, I can feel it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting soaked; what a waste of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden's so calm, but inside it's chaos waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't the faucet turned off? Someone needs to fix this now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hate seeing potential accidents like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The plate she's holding might shatter if she slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those open cabinet doors make it even riskier for the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR
